title: As I can know my mail in this account?
body:
I remember my user and password.
But I do not remember what my mail

replies.body: DTN provided some great information to help recover your account.  If you are still unable to regain access, please reach out to our [player support team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) who can help out.  I also recommend reviewing our [account recovery ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) guide to prepare for any questions you may be asked.

You can check or verify your email address by clicking your profile on the top right and going to **Settings**. If you are no longer able to access that email, please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they may be able to help. Also know that only the original owner of the account may use it, so if you don't know the email because it isn't yours then you shouldn't be on it.
